meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Elle Hood Jack Dumpert Mark Lowenthal Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #871.

td.p: Elle Hood, a housewife & attorney from Camarillo, California
Jack Dumpert, a bond manager from Buffalo, New York
Mark Lowenthal, a State Department employee from Reston, Virginia (whose 3-day cash winnings total $36,801)

tr.td: ALICE IN WONDERLAND
CURRENT EVENTS
COMMON BONDS
SNAKES
MINERALS
FROM THE LATIN

Jack

Jack
Elle

(including 2 DDs),
